text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: CodeSystem extension-style

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/extension-style defines the following codes:

CodeDefinition
none No extensions
fhir-extensions FHIR extension style: the element defines 'extension' which can be constrained by profiles
named-elements The type can be extended by having additional named elements, where the name is from the elementdefinition-xml-name or elementdefinition-json-name for xml and json respectively

Spanish

Generated Narrative: CodeSystem extension-style

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/extension-style defines the following codes:

CodeDefinition
none No extensions
fhir-extensions FHIR extension style: the element defines 'extension' which can be constrained by profiles
named-elements The type can be extended by having additional named elements, where the name is from the elementdefinition-xml-name or elementdefinition-json-name for xml and json respectively

name: ExtensionStyles
title: Extension Style Codes
description: How the type can be extended. Note that all FHIR types that inherit from ```Element``` have extension-style = fhir-extensions

concept.definition: FHIR extension style: the element defines 'extension' which can be constrained by profiles
The type can be extended by having additional named elements, where the name is from the elementdefinition-xml-name or elementdefinition-json-name for xml and json respectively
